overview: This video documentary with music takes you through the first decade of Fear Factory's career, from th early days at backyard parties and small rehearsal rooms, to sold out concerts around the globe. The band tells the story in the own words and lets you into their world through recording sessions, video outtakes, backstage life and the tour bus. Also included is lots of live material.
tagline: On the road with Fear Factory.
title: Fear Factory: Digital Connectivity
